facts.name: Space Facts
facts.description: Learn interesting facts about space exploration and astronomy.

factos.title: The Earth is not flat!
factos.text: The Earth is actually a sphere slightly flattened at the poles.

factos.title: There's water on Mars!
factos.text: Scientists have found evidence of water ice on Mars, both on the surface and underground.

factos.title: The Sun is a star!
factos.text: The Sun is a giant ball of hot plasma that generates light and heat through nuclear fusion.

facts.name: Animal Trivia
facts.description: Test your knowledge with fun facts about animals!

factos.title: A group of owls is called a parliament!
factos.text: There are many collective nouns for animals, and a group of owls is specifically called a parliament.

factos.title: A sloth's fur is green because of algae!
factos.text: The greenish tint on some sloths' fur is actually due to algae growing on their fur.

factos.title: Elephants can communicate infrasonically!
factos.text: Elephants can produce sounds at frequencies too low for humans to hear, allowing them to communicate over long distances.

facts.name: Famous Quotes
facts.description: Get inspired by the words of great thinkers and leaders.

factos.title: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
